statement.name: INSERT_SMASIS
statement.desc: Inserci√≥n tabla de politicas de seleccion
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMASIS( NROSIS, CODCIA, TPOSIS, NOMSIS, NROXVT, STDSIS) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMASIS
statement.desc: Update tabla de politicas de seleccion
statement.sql: UPDATE SMASIS SET TPOSIS = ?, NOMSIS = ?, NROXVT = ?, STDSIS = ? WHERE NROSIS = ?

statement.name: DELETE_SMASIS
statement.desc: Delete tabla de politicas de seleccion
